patthana22.7:1.1: Nakusalaṃ nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.7:3.1: Nakusalaṃ noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.7:5.1: Nakusalaṃ nooghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.7:7.1: Nakusalaṃ noyogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.7:9.1: Nakusalaṃ nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.7:11.1: Nakusalaṃ noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
